Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the financial incentive scheme is still being offered in the Italian region of Molise, when in fact it ended on November 30, 2019.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the financial incentive scheme has ended, as confirmed by the official document translated by the Italian government.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading post on social media and there is no evidence provided to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the financial incentive scheme is still ongoing without providing any evidence or official confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that the claim is a misunderstanding or misinterpretation of the previous financial incentive scheme that was offered in Molise.
